content.raw:
It's really satisfying to see the plots being drawn! Yay!

Some general comments, not necessarily to be addressed now:

1. It would be *really* nice to keep all the samples :smile:
1. It would be nice to zoom both the x and the y axis while playing. Currently only y is zoomed.
1. Box zoom would be useful
1. Each time a new number comes onto the X axis, the end of the plot area blinks
1. It would be nice if the legend box were resizable, and even movable
1. I'm on a laptop and when I chose to clear the canvas, the dialog showed up on another workspace. At first I thought Gazebo was frozen, and only later I found the dialog hidden.
